Are you saying Hella wants to ask me about #b#t4031056##k? It's been recorded that the book's been lost somewhere in the snowfield, and hmmm ... Right! A few days ago, while checking out the landscape around town I found a #bsmall tomb#k deep in the valley of the snowfield. Maybe that tomb has something to do with it...

I wanted to find out what that tomb was so I tried getting close to it, only to realize that it was impossible because of all the scary monsters around that area. I think you're strong enough, though, to find a way to go in there and thoroughly check out the tomb. The place where I found it was #bdeep in the valley of the snowfield#k. I'll pray for your safety throughout this trip.
